1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Part 1. Indonesia is a country in South-East Asia, that comprises of over seventeen thousand islands. Famous for many reasons as a holiday destination - few people realize it has the most diverse range of fish species in the world, which means first class diving. in 2010 a group of adventures headed to Komodo, to bring averseness of its natural beauty to make sure it wasn't lost in the name of progress. Your going to marvel at what is under the ocean, at some of the most beautiful underwater footage of all time. Come on this adventure with them, with Adventure Dive ...

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: In Part 2 the new divers hit the water in their scuba gear for the very first time which brings some scary moments for some. Toby and Per visit a fishing village close to an active volcano near Sangeang, then take the team on an unforgettable night dive.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: In Part 3 we are going to see some amazing fish and reef life. Noles will annoy the new divers as usual. Per and Toby are challenged by the Indonesian authorities to get the permits they needed to continue their Komodo diving adventure.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Tom learns his Eco-adventure lesson the hard way as he looses his water bottle. The new divers do their final dives before their exam and Noles tests out a new theory that sharks are attacked to plastic bottles. Let's hope he doesn't get eaten then.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Today the team dive the Komodo Island itself, while also coming head to hear with the famous Komodo Dragon. Also, will all the divers pass their course so they can dive at Manta Alley? We will find out and see more rare and unique footage of some more amazing creatures from under the sea.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: In the final part of the "Adventure Dive Komodo" series the whole team are on a high about diving the infamous Manta Alley and also discover a new never before documented species.

imdb.plot outline: Adventure Dive Komodo takes you on a journey with experienced divers and people who've never dived before who travel to one of the most unique marine environments in the world. Together you'll meet the Komodo Dragons, learn the culture and spend time underwater looking at creatures found nowhere else. One of the most unique diving series ever made.
imdb.title: Adventure Dive Komodo
plot: _Adventure Dive Komodo_ (qv) takes you on a journey with experienced divers and people who've never dived before who travel to one of the most unique marine environments in the world. Together you'll meet the Komodo Dragons, learn the culture and spend time underwater looking at creatures found nowhere else. One of the most unique diving series ever made.
